name: 陳心怡
objective:
This current course emphasizes a holistic view of business communication in a global context.  Given that business communication across from fields of business activities is now made possible by the English language, the course thus aims to develop the ability to use critical skills essential to successful oral communication in English, with particular emphases on oral forms of communications that are highly visible within and outside business organizations, including socializing, teleconferencing, giving presentations, taking part in meetings, negotiating, handling interview questions, etc. Informal communication skills are also incorporated to address workplace situations to identify the relevant communication needs. 

This course aims to foster an environment favorable for the development of team building skills including communication, active listening, problem solving, feedback offering, and so forth. Students will learn strategies and techniques for effective oral communication, discuss issues in business communication, analyze communication processes and problems, and practice techniques in simulated business situations. They will also learn useful language expressions and organizational patterns that are commonly used in English business communication to strengthen their ability to use English more appropriately and effectively.
